snippet.title: ID4 Independence Day (PC) Gameplay
snippet.description:
I didn't see any gameplay videos of the PC version on YouTube, so I figured I'd remedy that. As you can tell, the PC version has vastly superior graphics to the PS1 and Saturn versions. This is my first time playing the game on any platform, and it's actually much better than I expected.

8/23/13 EDIT: Just beat the game on normal. While it could get extremely frustrating at times, I did enjoy it. If you can find it cheap, I'd recommend it.

http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows7/install-and-use-windows-xp-mode-in-windows-7
